gen:link.label:label: BV1042: If "Use of matching adjustment" is reported in template S.01.02 - Basic Information - General, the item "Impact of matching adjustment set to zero" in template S.22.01 - The impact of removal of the measure is expected to be negative (i.e. removing the measure would decrease the amount of "Basic own funds" or "Eligible own funds to meet Solvency Capital Requirement") -->Template 1: S.01.02; Template 2: S.22.01; Rows: r0020;0050; Expression: If {S.01.02, r0170,c0010}=[s2c_PU:x51] then {S.22.01, rNNN,c0090}<0

BV1042: If "Use of matching adjustment" is reported in template S.01.02 - Basic Information - General, the item "Impact of matching adjustment set to zero" in template S.22.01 - The impact of removal of the measure is expected to be negative (i.e. removing the measure would decrease the amount of "Basic own funds" or "Eligible own funds to meet Solvency Capital Requirement") -->Template 1: S.01.02; Template 2: S.22.01; Rows: r0020;0050; Expression: If {S.01.02, r0170,c0010}=[s2c_PU:x51] then {S.22.01, rNNN,c0090}<0
